title: #include "textflag.h" compilation terminated
body:
Hi there,

**Error:**
**build/env.sh go run build/ci.go install ./cmd/geth
>>> /usr/bin/go install -ldflags -X main.gitCommit=d5bd38384c1c0630d77468c12c8ad99d57ac2229 -X main.gitDate=20190830 -v ./cmd/geth

Please use a recent Go compiler.
